title: Piz Alpetta
text: Piz Alpetta (2,764 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Glarus%20Alps">Glarus Alps</a>, located near <a href="Disentis">Disentis</a> in the canton of <a href="Graub%C3%BCnden">Graubünden</a>. It lies at the eastern end of the chain east of <a href="Piz%20Cavardiras">Piz Cavardiras</a>, between the <a href="Val%20Russein">Val Russein</a> and the main <a href="Rhine">Rhine</a> valley.
